subject: Automobile Racing
Flags, Emblems and Insignia
Charleston, SC, Shooting (2015)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Darlington Raceway will give out American flags to those who want to turn in a Confederate battle flag, continuing an initiative that began in Daytona, Fla.
snippet: Darlington Raceway will give out American flags to those who want to turn in a Confederate battle flag, continuing an initiative that began in Daytona, Fla.
